arts.ttl: Wrexham star James McClean set for awkward reunion after 'milking it' dig at Stoke City fans
arts.sum: Wrexham star James McClean faces a tense reunion as the Red Dragons visit his former club Stoke, where he spent three years and had several clashes with supporters
